cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rakudai

sentence.kanji: このテストに失敗したら落第です。
sentence.romaji: kono tesuto ni shipai shitara rakudai desu
sentence.english: You're going to flunk if you fail this test.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikiageru

sentence.kanji: 沈んだ船を引き上げたんだ。
sentence.romaji: shizunda fune wo hikiageta n da
sentence.english: The sunken ship was salvaged.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's osen

sentence.kanji: その川の水は汚染されています。
sentence.romaji: sono kawa no mizu ha osen sarete imasu
sentence.english: That river's water is polluted.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokorozuyoi

sentence.kanji: あなたが一緒にいてくれると心強い。
sentence.romaji: anata ga isho ni ite kureru to kokorozuyoi
sentence.english: I feel reassured when we are together.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokuhi

sentence.kanji: 彼は国費で留学しています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kokuhi de ryuugaku shite imasu
sentence.english: He's studying abroad on a government-funded scholarship.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shihi

sentence.kanji: 彼は私費で留学したんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shihi de ryuugaku shita n da
sentence.english: He went to study abroad at his own expense.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsutome

sentence.kanji: 人々を守るのが私の務めです。
sentence.romaji: hitobito wo mamoru no ga watashi no tsutome desu
sentence.english: It's my duty to defend people.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gaimushou

sentence.kanji: ビザについて外務省に問い合わせた。
sentence.romaji: biza ni tsuite gaimushou ni toiawaseta
sentence.english: I contacted the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to enquire about the visa.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kisei

sentence.kanji: 来週、帰省します。
sentence.romaji: raishuu kisei shimasu
sentence.english: I will go home next week.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gimu

sentence.kanji: 労働は国民の義務です。
sentence.romaji: roudou ha kokumin no gimu desu
sentence.english: It's a citizen's duty to work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyousei

sentence.kanji: 彼らは労働を強制されたんだ。
sentence.romaji: karera ha roudou wo kyousei sareta n da
sentence.english: They were forced to work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikinobasu

sentence.kanji: この写真を引き伸ばしてください。
sentence.romaji: kono shashin wo hikinobashite kudasai
sentence.english: Please enlarge this photograph.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gouin

sentence.kanji: 友人の強引な誘いを断れませんでした。
sentence.romaji: yuujin no gouin na sasoi wo kotowaremasen deshita
sentence.english: I was not able to decline my friend's persistent invitation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikizuru

sentence.kanji: 彼はまだ失恋を引きずっています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha mada shitsuren wo hikizute imasu
sentence.english: He's still dragging along the emotional baggage of a romantic breakup.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's michi

sentence.kanji: ここからは未知の領域です。
sentence.romaji: koko kara ha michi no ryouiki desu
sentence.english: It's an unknown area from here on.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chishiki

sentence.kanji: 私は旅行から多くの知識を得た。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha ryokou kara ooku no chishiki wo eta
sentence.english: I gained a lot of knowledge from traveling.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikomu

sentence.kanji: ダイエットをしてお腹が引っ込みました。
sentence.romaji: daieto wo shite onaka ga hikomimashita
sentence.english: I dieted and my stomach flattened out.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chikarazuyoi

sentence.kanji: 彼は力強い演技をするね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha chikarazuyoi engi wo suru ne
sentence.english: He's a powerful actor.

cards.english: perform a duty, play a role
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsutomeru

sentence.kanji: 私が司会を務めます。
sentence.romaji: watashi ga shikai wo tsutomemasu
sentence.english: I'll serve as the host.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikinobasu

sentence.kanji: 司会者は話を引き延ばしたわ。
sentence.romaji: shikaisha ha hanashi wo hikinobashita wa
sentence.english: The emcee prolonged his speech.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juunan

sentence.kanji: 彼は柔軟に対応をした。
sentence.romaji: kare ha juunan ni taiou wo shita
sentence.english: He gave a flexible response.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yawarakai

sentence.kanji: 柔らかい日差しが気持ちいいね。
sentence.romaji: yawarakai hizashi ga kimochi ii ne
sentence.english: Soft sunlight feels pleasant.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiriai

sentence.kanji: 街で知り合いを見かけたよ。
sentence.romaji: machi de shiriai wo mikaketa yo
sentence.english: I saw an acquaintance in town.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikakaru

sentence.kanji: 魚の骨がのどに引っ掛かった。
sentence.romaji: sakana no hone ga nodo ni hikakata
sentence.english: A fish bone got caught in my throat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikakeru

sentence.kanji: その選手はハードルに足を引っ掛けたんだ。
sentence.romaji: sono senshu ha ha-doru ni ashi wo hikaketa n da
sentence.english: The athlete caught his foot on the hurdle.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yowami

sentence.kanji: 彼は私の弱みを握っているんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha watashi no yowami wo nigite iru n da
sentence.english: He's got dirt on me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gakuhi

sentence.kanji: 彼はアルバイトをして学費を稼いだんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha arubaito wo shite gakuhi wo kaseida n da 。
sentence.english: He worked part-time to earn his tuition money.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyouryoku

sentence.kanji: これは強力な接着剤ね。
sentence.romaji: kore ha kyouryoku na sechakuzai ne
sentence.english: This is a powerful adhesive.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keimusho

sentence.kanji: 彼は二度と刑務所から出ることができないの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha nidoto keimusho kara deru koto ga dekinai no
sentence.english: He can never be released from prison.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's monoshiri

sentence.kanji: あの老人はとても物知りだね。
sentence.romaji: ano roujin ha totemo monoshiri da ne
sentence.english: That old person is very knowledgeable.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyouretsu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は強烈な個性の持ち主ですよ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kyouretsu na kosei no mochinushi desu yo
sentence.english: She has a very strong personality.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiri

sentence.kanji: 霧の深い夜のことでした。
sentence.romaji: kiri no fukai yoru no koto deshita
sentence.english: It was a foggy night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's han

sentence.kanji: 班のメンバーは5人です。
sentence.romaji: han no menba- ha 5 nin desu
sentence.english: There are five members in the group.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oboreru

sentence.kanji: 彼は溺れている子を助けたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha oborete iru ko wo tasuketa n da
sentence.english: He saved the drowning child.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atsui

sentence.kanji: 今日はとても暑い。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha totemo atsui
sentence.english: It's very hot today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kangaeru

sentence.kanji: よく考えてください。
sentence.romaji: yoku kangaete kudasai
sentence.english: Please think carefully.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gakou

sentence.kanji: 学校は8時半に始まります。
sentence.romaji: gakou ha hachijihan ni hajimarimasu
sentence.english: School starts at 8:30.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otousan

sentence.kanji: お父さんは会社員です。
sentence.romaji: otousan ha kaishain desu
sentence.english: My father's a company employee.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chichi

sentence.kanji: 私は父が大好きです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha chichi ga daisuki desu
sentence.english: I love my father.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oshieru

sentence.kanji: 彼は数学を教えています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha suugaku wo oshiete imasu
sentence.english: He teaches mathematics.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ashi

sentence.kanji: 彼は足が長い。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ashi ga nagai
sentence.english: He has long legs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's semai

sentence.kanji: 私の部屋は狭いです。
sentence.romaji: watashi no heya ha semai desu
sentence.english: My room is small.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tariru

sentence.kanji: お金が足りなくて買えなかった。
sentence.romaji: okane ga tarinakute kaenakata
sentence.english: I couldn't buy it because I didn't have enough money.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's douro

sentence.kanji: この道路は3年前にできました。
sentence.romaji: kono douro ha sannenmae ni dekimashita
sentence.english: This road was completed three years ago.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kangae

sentence.kanji: それは良い考えです。
sentence.romaji: sore ha ii kangae desu
sentence.english: That's a good idea.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shougakou

sentence.kanji: 家の近くに小学校があります。
sentence.romaji: ie no chikaku ni shougakou ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's an elementary school near my house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuukou

sentence.kanji: 学校は今週は休校です。
sentence.romaji: gakou ha konshuu ha kyuukou desu
sentence.english: School is closed this week.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sugiru

sentence.kanji: 時が過ぎるのは速い。
sentence.romaji: toki ga sugiru no ha hayai 。
sentence.english: Time passes quickly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kako

sentence.kanji: それは過去の話だ。
sentence.romaji: sore ha kako no hanashi da
sentence.english: That's in the past now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kousaten

sentence.kanji: 次の交差点を左に曲がってください。
sentence.romaji: tsugi no kousaten wo hidari ni magate kudasai
sentence.english: Please turn left at the next intersection.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyoushitsu

sentence.kanji: 私の教室は3階にあります。
sentence.romaji: watashi no kyoushitsu ha sangai ni arimasu
sentence.english: My classroom is on the third floor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koukou

sentence.kanji: 妹は高校に通っています。
sentence.romaji: imouto ha koukou ni kayote imasu
sentence.english: My little sister goes to high school.
